data.eml:eml: Enigmatic Late Permian cockroaches from Isady, Russia (Blattida: Mutoviidae fam. n.)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vršanský, Peter, Aristov, Danil (2012): Enigmatic Late Permian cockroaches from Isady, Russia (Blattida: Mutoviidae fam. n.). Zootaxa 3247: 19-31, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.213150
